title: GET RID OF ALL THE KIDS
body:
I AM SO SICK OF NEVER BEING ABLE TO ENJOY A SINGLE GAME DURING THE WEEKEND BECAUSE OF STUPID CRYBABY LITTLE KIDS THAT WEREN'T TAUGHT FUCKING RESPECT BY THEIR SHITTY PARENTS!

If it was up to me I would ban every single person on LoL that hasn't hit puberty! All they do is start crying about their cs and kda and then end up ruining the game for everyone else if they don't get their way!

All of these stupid entitled crybabies need to go! I can't ever enjoy one game during the weekend and it is because of all of the stupid kids on here!

I would say make this an 18+ only game and ban everyone else but my opinion doesn't mean shit.
